name: HTML Element
description: A custom HTML element placed on top of the canvas that can display arbitrary HTML content.

conditions.name: On clicked
conditions.description: Triggered when any part of the element is clicked.

conditions.name: On clicked ID
conditions.description: Triggered when an element with a specific ID is clicked.

params.name: ID
params.description: The ID of the element that was clicked.

conditions.name: On clicked class
conditions.description: Triggered when an element with a specific class is clicked.

params.name: Class
params.description: The class of the element that was clicked. Use space-separated class names to match multiple classes.

conditions.name: On CSS animation ended
conditions.description: Triggered when a CSS animation ends.

params.name: Animation name
params.description: The name of the CSS animation (as defined by the @keyframes rule), case insensitive.

actions.name: Set content
actions.description: Set the content of the element to a string of HTML, BBcode or plain text. NOTE: escape user-provided values in HTML.

params.name: Content type
params.description: How to interpret the given string.

params.name: String
params.description: A string to set for the element content. NOTE: escape user-provided values in HTML.

params.name: Selector
params.description: An optional CSS selector of a child element to set the content for. Leave empty to set content for the entire element.

params.name: Type
params.description: Whether to affect one element matching the selector, or all matching elements.

actions.name: Insert content
actions.description: Insert a string of HTML, BBcode or plain text. NOTE: escape user-provided values in HTML.

params.name: Content type
params.description: How to interpret the given string.

params.name: String
params.description: A string to set for the element content. NOTE: escape user-provided values in HTML.

params.name: Position
params.description: Whether to insert content at the start or end of the element.

params.name: Selector
params.description: An optional CSS selector of a child element to insert content to. Leave empty to insert content to the main HTML element.

params.name: Type
params.description: Whether to affect one element matching the selector, or all matching elements.

actions.name: Remove content
actions.description: Remove or clear elements matching a CSS selector.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether to entirely remove the matching elements, or clear their contents.

params.name: Selector
params.description: A CSS selector which will be used to match elements. Leave empty to clear the main HTML element.

params.name: Type
params.description: Whether to affect one element matching the selector, or all matching elements.

actions.name: Set class
actions.description: Add, toggle or remove classes for elements matching a CSS selector.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether to add, toggle or remove classes.

params.name: Class
params.description: The class name to change. Use space-separated class names to affect multiple classes.

params.name: Selector
params.description: A CSS selector which will be used to match elements. Leave empty to use the main HTML element.

params.name: Type
params.description: Whether to affect one element matching the selector, or all matching elements.

actions.name: Set attribute
actions.description: Set or remove attributes for elements matching a CSS selector.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether to set or remove attributes.

params.name: Attribute
params.description: The attribute to change.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to set for the attribute (ignored if removing attribute).

params.name: Selector
params.description: A CSS selector which will be used to match elements. Leave empty to use the main HTML element.

params.name: Type
params.description: Whether to affect one element matching the selector, or all matching elements.

actions.name: Set CSS style
actions.description: Set a CSS style on elements matching a CSS selector.

params.name: Property name
params.description: A CSS property name to set on the HTML element.

params.name: Value
params.description: A string to assign as the value for this CSS property.

params.name: Selector
params.description: A CSS selector which will be used to match elements. Leave empty to use the main HTML element.

params.name: Type
params.description: Whether to affect one element matching the selector, or all matching elements.

actions.name: Position object at element
actions.description: Set an object's size and position to match an HTML element.

params.name: Object
params.description: The object to move and resize.

params.name: Selector
params.description: A CSS selector identifying the element to position the object to.

actions.name: Create sprite image element
actions.description: Create an element with the image of a Sprite object and insert it.
actions.display_text: Create {0} image element at [i]{1}[/i], insert [i]{2}[/i], ID [i]{3}[/i], class [i]{4}[/i]

params.name: Object
params.description: The object to use an image from.

params.name: Selector
params.description: A CSS selector identifying the parent element the image element will be inserted to. Leave empty to use the main HTML element.

params.name: Insert
params.description: Whether to insert the image element at the start, end, or replace the entire content of the parent element.

params.name: ID
params.description: An optional ID to set for the created image element.

params.name: Class
params.description: An optional class to set for the created image element.

actions.name: Set scroll position
actions.description: Set the scroll position of a scrollable element.

params.name: Selector
params.description: A CSS selector identifying the element to scroll. Leave empty to use the main HTML element.

params.name: Direction
params.description: Whether to set the scroll left or top position.

params.name: Position
params.description: The scroll position to set in CSS pixels.

expressions.name: HTMLContent
expressions.description: String with HTML content of the element.

expressions.name: TextContent
expressions.description: String with plain text content of the element.

expressions.name: TargetID
expressions.description: In a trigger, the ID of the targeted element.

expressions.name: TargetClass
expressions.description: In a trigger, the class of the targeted element.

expressions.name: EscapeHTML
expressions.description: Convert HTML tag characters like < to entities like < so text cannot alter HTML.

params.name: String
params.description: String of HTML to escape.
